thread.title: Venue for Sher audio launch confirmed
thread.title_full: Venue for Sher audio launch confirmed - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Venue for Sher audio launch confirmed
text: Nandamuri Kalyan Ram's upcoming film, Sher, is getting ready to hit the screens on October 30. Directed by Mallikarjun, the film has Sonal Chauhan as the leading lady. Komar Venkatesh has produced it under his Vijaya Lakshmi Pictures banner. The audio,composed by SS Thaman, will be unveiled on October 10. As per the latest update, the event will take place in 'Park Hyatt' hotel in Hyderabad. Young Tiger NTR will grace the event to unveil the audio.
